item.description:
Venez

... boire un coup, ou manger un bout (the restaurant does require each person to order *something*).
... faire la connaissance d'autres francophones.
... profiter d'une discussion en fran√ßais avec des amis.

Venez nous rejoindre!

Get map and driving directions from the Portsmouth Brewery URL (below). Street parking is usually impossible, so plan on parking in the Hanover Street garage, off of Hanover Street (doh!) or from other locations nearby the brewery where you see the familiar green P-for-parking sign.

We're going to try to meet in the side room, which is smaller and quieter than the main room. (We'll leave word at the entrance where to find us!)

Please note that the restaurant will require each attendee to purchase *something*. Of course there are lots of great microbrewed beers on tap, but the brewery also serves nonalcoholic drinks and has a pretty extensive menu -- from salads and sandwiches to full meals.

For more information, see http://www.portsmouth...

group.name: Seacoast NH French Language Meetup Group

item.name: Seacoast NH French Language June Meetup #2
